LanguageData.ConstructorCore.label: auxiliary AI: construction
LanguageData.ConstructorCore.description: An installed auxiliary AI that aids with construction.
LanguageData.FarmerCore.label: auxiliary AI: agricultural
LanguageData.FarmerCore.description: An installed auxiliary AI that aids with farming.
LanguageData.MinerCore.label: auxiliary AI: mining
LanguageData.MinerCore.description: An installed auxiliary AI that aids with mining.
LanguageData.DoctorCore.label: auxiliary AI: medical
LanguageData.DoctorCore.description: An installed auxiliary AI that aids with medical procedures.
LanguageData.DiplomatCore.label: auxiliary AI: diplomatic
LanguageData.DiplomatCore.description: An installed auxiliary AI that aids with diplomatic conversations.
LanguageData.AuxiliaryAI_Sharpshooter.label: auxiliary AI: sharpshooter
LanguageData.AuxiliaryAI_Sharpshooter.description: An installed auxiliary AI that aids combat, specializing in accuracy and long distance fire. Cannot be installed with other auxiliary AI.
LanguageData.AuxiliaryAI_Commando.label: auxiliary AI: commando
LanguageData.AuxiliaryAI_Commando.description: An installed auxiliary AI that aids combat, supporting the user in coping with the pressures of combat. Cannot be installed with other auxiliary AI.
LanguageData.AuxiliaryAI_Brawler.label: auxiliary AI: brawler
LanguageData.AuxiliaryAI_Brawler.description: An installed auxiliary AI that aids close quarter combat, supporting the user with life or death decisions. Cannot be installed with other auxiliary AI.
LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.label: AI persona core
LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.description: An installed AI persona core. Requires minimum 60% medical tending as maintenance to prevent the AI persona core from going rogue.
LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.stages.0.label: Unmaintained
LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.stages.1.label: Unmaintained
LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.stages.2.label: Maintenance critical
LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.stages.3.label: Maintenance required
